Package maldiniPaone.databaseConnection

Class UserDataChecker

java.lang.Object
maldiniPaone.databaseConnection.UserDataChecker
public class UserDataChecker
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains protected static methods which are used to get and update data about users. Those methods checks parameters values to check data validity and avoid inconsistent data. All methods may throw exceptions if database can't be reached or parameters are not valid. The actual communication with the database happens in UserDatabaseConnector.
See Also:
UserDatabaseConnector

  • Method Details

    • AddCitizen

      protected static boolean AddCitizen​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email) throws IllegalParameterException, ServerSideDatabaseException
      Calls the function to add citizen inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the citizen to be added
      password - : the password of the citizen to be added
      email - : the email address of the citizen to be added
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the creation is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addMunicipality

      protected static boolean addMunicipality​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.String cityName, java.lang.String cityProvince) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the function to add Municipality inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the Municipality to be added
      password - : the password of the Municipality to be added
      email - : the email address of the Municipality to be added
      creator - : the municipality that is adding the municipality(null if it is added by a system manager)
      cityName - : the name of the city hall where the municipality works
      cityProvince - : the province where the city hall is located
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the creation is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addAuthority

      protected static boolean addAuthority​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String creator, java.lang.Integer districtId) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the function to add Authority inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the Authority to be added
      password - : the password of the Authority to be added
      email - : the email address of the Authority to be added
      creator - : the municipality that is adding the Authority
      districtId - : the district where the Authority works
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the creation is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

      Calls the function to add Manager inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the Manager to be added
      password - : the password of the Manager to be added
      email - : the email address of the Manager to be added
      venueName - : the venue name of the Manager
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the creation is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addCityhall

      protected static boolean addCityhall​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String region, Location location) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the function to add Manager inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the cityhall to be added
      province - : the name of the province of the cityhall
      region - : the name of the region where the cityhall is located
      location - : the coordinates of the cityhall
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the creation is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • addDistrict

      protected static java.lang.Integer addDistrict​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String province, Location locationTopLeft, Location locationBottomRight) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the function to add District inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      name - : the name of the cityhall in which the district is located
      province - : the name of the province of the cityhall
      locationTopLeft - : the coordinates of the topleft corner of the district
      locationBottomRight - :the coordinates of the bottomright corner of the district
      Returns:
      Integer : the id of the created district, -1 if failed
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • getCityHall

      protected static CityHall getCityHall​(java.lang.String username) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Gets the city hall where a municipality works
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the municipality whose city hall is being searched
      Returns:
      CityHall
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • checkUserCredentials

      protected static UserType checkUserCredentials​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the function to check user type inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user to be found
      password - : the password of the user
      Returns:
      UserType : the user type of the user, null if no user with those credentials exists
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • modifyUser

      protected static boolean modifyUser​(java.lang.String oldUsername, java.lang.String oldPassword, UserType user, java.lang.String newEmail, java.lang.String newUsername, java.lang.String newPassword) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the function to update user data inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - : the old user name of the user to be modified
      oldPassword - : the old password of the user
      user - : the type of the user that must be modified
      newEmail - : the new email to be set(set to null if no modification needed)
      newUsername - : the new user name to be set
      newPassword - : the new password to be set
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the update is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • forgotPassword

      protected static boolean forgotPassword​(java.lang.String oldUsername, UserType user, java.lang.String newPassword) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Calls the function to update user data inside UserDatabaseConnector this function checks the validity of the parameters and calls the appropriate function
      Parameters:
      oldUsername - : the old user name of the user to be modified
      user - : the type of the user that must be modified
      newPassword - : the new password to be set
      Returns:
      boolean : true if the update is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • removeUser

      protected static boolean removeUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, UserType user) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Removes a user given its user name and password
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user to be deleted
      password - : the password of the user to be deleted
      user - : the user type of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      boolean: true if the deletion is successful, false if fails
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • findEmailByUsername

      protected static java.lang.String findEmailByUsername​(java.lang.String username) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Finds the email address of a user
      Parameters:
      username - : the user name of the user whose email must be retrieved
      Returns:
      String : the email of the user . null if no user exists with the given username
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)

    • findUsernameByEmail

      protected static java.lang.String findUsernameByEmail​(java.lang.String email) throws ServerSideDatabaseException, IllegalParameterException
      Finds the user name of a user
      Parameters:
      email - : the email address of the user whose user name must be retrieved
      Returns:
      String : the user name of the user . null if no user exists with the given email
      Throws:
      ServerSideDatabaseException - when the database can't be found
      IllegalParameterException - when parameters are not valid(empty or null)
